entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine CanUpdateComplexParameters and CanUpdateSimpleParameters #54889
  • One Dll File In Wasm #54888
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #54883
  • [Blazor] Parameter on root page causes loss of layout/CSS #54880
  • Questions about Blazor component disposal #54876
  • [Static Web Assets] Runtime APIs to consume the generated endpoint manifest from the SDK #54875
    9.0-preview4
  • [Static Web Assets] Define mechanism to fingerprint an asset relative path and generate new endpoints for it. #54874
    9.0-preview4
  • [Static web assets] Define static web asset endpoints in the SDK and generate an endpoints manifest #54873
    9.0-preview4
  • SignalR TypeScript client - WebSocket - surface out the 'upgrade' event #54865

Closed

  • Perf regression: caching, plaintext_spring #54863
  • bug #54882
  • Unified Build control update #43637
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring #54837
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #54849
  • Perf regression: mapaction #54859

PullRequests

Created

  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Force full reload on popstate #54877
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54872
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54869
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24201.1 #54868
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54866
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update test-configuration.json #54887
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Skip CodeQL in public builds #54886
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Bump helix-matrix timeout up to 5 hours #54885
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • 1ES-ify SignalR Daily Tests pipeline #54884
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Avoid O(N) string[] allocations for N header values in GetCommaSeparatedValues #54808
    Perf, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Added retry for CheckInvalidHostingModelParameter #54786
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Support resolving OpenApiPaths entries from document #54847
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • update IdentityModel to latest #54601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Convert to 1es templates #54853
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54656
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54778
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54777
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54779
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Include ContentLength when enumerating HttpHeaders #54760
    area-networking
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
